short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click drag and release to take a screenshot of any part of any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The simplest one-click screenshot tool for Chrome. Minimal permissions required!

Features:

✨ Activate with one click on any page
👇 Click, drag, and release to capture
⬇️ Auto-downloads screenshot
📋 Copies to clipboard instantly
🙊 No account or sign-up needed

Permissions:

clipboardWrite: Allows copying screenshots to clipboard

Simple, fast, and lightweight. Capture and share with ease.
